meanings.sent1: The old bridge was unsafer than the new one.
meanings.sent2: It is unsafer to walk alone in the dark.
meanings.sent3: He thought wearing a helmet while eating was unsafer than not wearing one.
meanings.sent4: Her unsafer decisions led her down a treacherous path.
meanings.sent5: The unsafer route through the forest was filled with hidden dangers.

meanings.sent1: Swimming in the deep end of the pool is unsafer for beginners.
meanings.sent2: It is unsafer to drive without a seatbelt.
meanings.sent3: Eating spicy food before a rollercoaster ride is unsafer for your stomach.
meanings.sent4: His unsafer behavior at the edge of the cliff made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent5: The unsafer option of skydiving without proper training is extremely risky.
